newsitem.title: USA: Regent Bancshares names Goldstein CEO.
newsitem.headline: Regent Bancshares names Goldstein CEO.

text.p: Regent Bancshares Corp said Tuesday that Robert Goldstein has been appointed as chief executive of the company and of its subsidiary, Regent National Bank.
The company said John Lyons, who served as interim president and chief executive of Regent National Bank, announced Goldstein's appointment.
The company did not say who Goldstein succeeds at the parent company, and it was not immediately available for further comment.
It said in a release that Goldstein is the former chief executive of Lafayette American Bank in Bridgeport, Connecticut.
